name: SAMHSA National Helpline
description: Free, confidential, 24/7, 365-day-a-year treatment referral and information service for individuals and families facing mental and/or substance use disorders. Available in English and Spanish. Provides referrals to local treatment facilities, support groups, and community-based organizations. Also offers online treatment locator at FindTreatment.gov and text messaging service (text HELP4U to 435748).
hours_of_operation: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year
notes: Formerly known as the National Clearinghouse for Alcohol and Drug Information (NCADI). The old number 800-729-6686 is no longer active. This is the current official SAMHSA National Helpline. TTY available at 1-800-487-4889. Online treatment locator available at FindTreatment.gov.
